ep <- data.frame(start=c("2009-07-13 23:45:00", "2009-08-14 08:30:00", 
                         "2009-09-16 15:30:00"), 
                 end=c("2009-07-14 00:03:00", "2009-08-15 08:35:00", 
                       "2009-09-19 07:30:00"))

2009-07-13  15
2009-07-14  3
2009-08-14  930
2009-08-15  515
2009-09-16  510
2009-09-17  1440
2009-09-18  1440
2009-09-19  450
